entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -33.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -36.5°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
